messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson, assisted in moving the decedent and noted a spent casing. Technician Muhammad collect3d the casing. Sergeant McMullen informed Detective Morton of a blood trail leading away from the scene. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers performed tests. Coroner's Investigator Parnell Williams classified the deaths as homicides. Detective Aucoin secured the crime scene. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, and Detective Ananie Mitchell were all involved in various capacities. Detective Pratt handled a separate scene. Detective Mathews and Detective Morton conducted interviews and reviewed evidence, with Morton interviewing Earlitta Taylor and Darceleen Commodore regarding the incident. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger was involved in scene sketching. Detectives Gebbia and Venezia interviewed witnesses and processed information, with Sergeant Ruiz coordinating efforts.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Role: Assistant to InvestigatorOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Coroner's Investigator Parnell WilliamsOfficer Role: Coroner's InvestigatorOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective PrattOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MathewsOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Officer Gary SalliengerOfficer Role: Scientific Criminal Investigations Division OfficerOfficer Name: Detectives Gebbia and VeneziaOfficer Role: DetectivesOfficer Name: Sergeant RuizOfficer Role: Sergeant
